pages.title: Small Cauldron
pages.text: A focused brewing station for magical concoctions. Load ingredients, ensure heat, insert a Rustic Bottle, and let it simmer into a brew. See $(l:hexalia:content/brews)Brews$(/l) for recipes.

pages.title: Block Overview
pages.text: $(bold)Slots$(): 3 input, 1 bottle, 1 output.$(br)$(bold)Brew Time$(): default 175t.$(br)$(bold)XP$(): awards XP to the last interacting player.$(br)Inputs can be placed in any order.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Heat source$(): place above a $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#rustic_oven)Rustic Oven$(/l) or another valid heat.$(br)$(li)$(bold)Valid recipe$(): must match a Small Cauldron recipe.$(br)$(li)$(bold)Bottle$(): a $(thing)Rustic Bottle$() in the bottle slot.$(br)$(li)$(bold)Output space$(): the output slot must be free.

pages.title: Brewing Sequence
pages.text: $(li)All inputs and the bottle are consumed.$(br)$(li)The result is placed in the output slot.$(br)$(li)XP is granted to the last interacting player.

pages.title: Failure Conditions
pages.text: $(li)Heat removed: brewing pauses.$(br)$(li)Inputs removed: progress resets.$(br)$(li)Output blocked: process halts until cleared.

pages.title: Learn the Recipes
pages.text: For exact ingredients, XP, and effects, see $(l:hexalia:content/brews)Brews$(/l). You can also store finished brews on the $(l:hexalia:content/functional_blocks#shelf)Shelf$(/l) for quick access.
